column3: X X X X X X was in the hallway and requested to have his own space. then lured another student into his space and began hitting the student. Support was called and walked into a calming area. Then walked out of calming area and attempted to hit staff and other students. Support was called and was put into a supine. was calm and went to a separate location.
X spilled some of his milk during lunch. He became mad and tipped his desk. On his way out of the room
column4: he threw the garbage can. In the hall he began destroying property. Once support came he became physically aggressive and was placed in a supine.

column3: X X X Time out: Physical intervention: escort eloped from class. was at the end of the hall talking with another student. attempted to push through the doors to get to where was in an aggressive manner. ripped the fire alarm off the wall. Support escorted him to time out.
X X X T.O. time was refusing to do math work and began to become increasingly aggressive. stared throwing objects and was unsafe. Support was called and was escorted to a T.O.
X X was being noncompliant in the classroom. He was given redirection
column4: he continued to escalate and became aggressive towards staff. Support escorted to the T.O. room. T.O. physical intervention: escort
